trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> class to iterate through a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> objects, which represent the resources for which location-specific configuration settings are defined.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> classe para iterar por meio de uma coleção de <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> objetos que representam os recursos para os quais definições de configuração específicas de local são definidas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> is the type returned by the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Locations%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> é o tipo retornado pelo <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Locations%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> class might not reference the collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> objects in the order that they are specified in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> classe não pode fazer referência à coleção de <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> objetos na ordem em que foram especificados no arquivo de configuração.

trans-unit.source: In the following code example, the Web configuration for the application `MySampleApp` is loaded, and the locations defined in this configuration are displayed by iterating through the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> object returned by the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Locations%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: No seguinte exemplo de código, a configuração da Web para o aplicativo `MySampleApp` é carregado, e os locais definidos nesta configuração são exibidos pela iteração a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Locations%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The index location of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection" /> to return.
trans-unit.target: O local do índice do <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection" /> a ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection" /> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection" /> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection.Item%2A> accessor to the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> class to get a specific <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> object from the collection by specifying its index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection.Item%2A> acessador para a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> classe para obter um determinado <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> objeto da coleção, especificando seu índice na coleção.
